product_name: Mountain Khakis Downtown Snap Down Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're wintering in Jackson Hole or in NYC, the men's Downtown Snap Down Jacket from Mountain Khakis keeps you toasty with its down insulation while you rock retro Western style. High-quality 630-fill-power down provides substantial warmth, flexibility and years of extended duty. Nylon high-density shell has a durable water repellent finish that helps precipitation roll off. Polyester taffeta lining glides on easily over a sweater or fleece. Snap front closure; snap flap chest pocket; 3-snap cuff closure. Downtown Snap Down Jacket for men features a casual fit, split-tail hem and signature Mountain Khakis back yoke. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're wintering in Jackson Hole or in NYC, the men's Downtown Snap Down Jacket from Mountain Khakis keeps you toasty with its down insulation while you rock retro Western style.
